title: Master of Wind
Ghost Lord
General of Hela
Morrow.description: Ex-disciple of Sensei Wu and candidate for the position of Green Ninja. After being rejected, he fell into darkness and wandered into the Ghost Realm in pursuit of power. There, he became a ghost himself and trained under a new master before unifying all the ghosts under him and trying to take his revenge on Sensei Wu and the ninja. After his defeat, Hela recruited him and made him one of her four generals, placing him in charge of spying and assassination matters.

title: Master of Wind
Ghost Lord
General of Hela
The Revenant
Master of the Sanjiegun
Morrow Incarnated.description: After the final conflict against Sigfried, Morrow, angry at his weakness and jealous of the power of the ninja, departed on a quest to grow stronger. He returned with an artifact as well as a new bodyâ€”half ghost, half human. His new body has all the advantages of a ghost without the weaknesses.

Annastasia.weapon: Dual ghost blades enhanced with wind power by Morrow.
Annastasia.description: Right arm of Morrow as well as his big sister, she is the most skilled assassin of the Ghost World.

Ghost Assassins.description: Ghost soldiers working under Annastasia's command.

title: Ultimate Weapon
The Hybrid
Rasputin.weapon: An anti-magic staff enhanced with ice and fire power.
Rasputin.description: A ghost soldier who was the test subject of Dr. Victor under Hela's orders. He was infused with ice and fire magic and given an anti-magic staff to create a warrior with no weaknesses.

Ghost Hound Master.description: A ghost soldier in charge of training and controlling ghost hounds.

Ghost Hounds.description: Ghost hounds can possess people and control them.

Ghost Captains.description: A ghost soldier who, after multiple battles, was granted the rank of captain.

Ghost Archers.description: A ghost soldier who attacks from long range.

title: Wielder of the drak saber
Sucessor of mandalor the firt
Djin.weapon: The dark saber, a light blaster
Djin.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He won in battle the dark saber, making him the heir to trone of Mandalore. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

title: The sky
Alpha.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He specialized himself in aerial combat and manuvoer. His fitghing style complete the one of his brother Omega. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a custom jet pack made of beskar.

title: The earth
Omega.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He specialized himself in close combat on the ground. His fitghing style complete the one of his brother Alpha. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

Kamur.weapon: A laser crossbow, a ligth machine gun, a blater with a bayonet
Kamur.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He consider himself as a weapon expert. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor made of beskar.

Katan.description: She is a pround mandalorian warrior. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

Ron.weapon: A light blaster and a combat knife
Ron.description: He is a pround mandalorian warrior. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

Rhyx.weapon: A laser chainsword and an energie shield
Rhyx.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He is a close combat instructor. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor made of beskar.

Verga.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. She is a shouting instructor. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor made of beskar.

Jango.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. He worked as a bounty hunter for many year before coming back to Mandalore. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

Boba.weapon: A long range blaster, a light blaster, a rocket lautcher, a flame trower
Boba.description: A pround mandalorian warrior. Following the foot tep of his father Jango, departed from Madalore to became a bouty hunter. Just like other mandalorian warrior, he is equiped with a an amor and a jet pack made of beskar.

Grogu.description: A child found and adopted by Djin during one of is mission. Djin decided to take care of him and train him to become a mandalorian warrior. For now he is a trainee.
